description: The cause of CVE-2023-5485 is an inappropriate implementation in the autofill feature of the Chromium open-source software, which is utilized by Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based). This technical flaw allows for unexpected behavior during the autofill process, potentially leading to user data exposure. The problem originated in Chromium version 118.0.5993.70 and was addressed in the subsequent Microsoft Edge version 118.0.2088.46, which incorporates the necessary fixes. Users are advised to update their browsers to this build to mitigate the risk associated with this issue. The related KB Article for more context is KB-118.0.2088.46.
